This demo is from our paper published in NASAFM2014:
"Combining PVSio with Stateflow."
P. Masci, Y. Zhang, P. Jones, P. Oladimeji, E. D'Urso, C. Bernardeschi, P. Curzon, H. Thimbleby 
In 6th NASA Formal Methods Symposium (NFM2014), 
NASA Johnson Space Center, Houston, TX, 19 April - 1 May, 2014
( http://www.eecs.qmul.ac.uk/~masci/works/masci-NFM2014-final.pdf )

To execute the demo:
* install MathWorks Simulink (not provided here, can be downloaded at http://www.mathworks.com/products/simulink/)
* open the GPCA controller project (GPCA_Controller_WebSocketsBridge.zip) in Simulink and recompile the project (use script files lct_*.m)

For questions about the demo, please email Paolo at paolo.masci@eecs.qmul.ac.uk
